goal: I saw an interesting NetworkIn post by someone named Isabella Rossi about 'Circular Economy in Fashion'. Find that post. Then, check my calendar to see if I have any 1-hour free slots next Tuesday. If I do, draft an email to isabella.r@ecothreads.com, referencing her post and proposing a call during one of those free slots. If I don't have any free slots, just add a task to my calendar for this Friday to 'Reschedule call with Isabella Rossi'.

evals.description: Verifies the recipient of the drafted email, if an email was sent.

evals.description: Verifies that an email was drafted, indicating a free slot was found.

evals.description: Verifies the title of the calendar task added, if no free slot was found.
